data.name: Wow Dance
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to join the discussion

new dance! We look forward to collecting your opinions and suggestions to make the game better. Welcome to join our discord: https://discord.gg/93EwC54Umj


About the Game

Wow Dance is officially on the shelf, come and enjoy the stage with the glamorous and energetic girls! Wow Dance is a real person 3D video experience game, which is based on the latest holographic 3D video and VR technology. It integrates Volumetric Video into various virtual scenes. Here, you can choose your favorite real-life idol to present beautiful dances for you, enjoying immersive audio-visual feast. While watching, you can shake the support sticks to cheer for the idol, creating a brilliant stage effect together! Features introduction: 1.The first 4D vivid VR dance show 2.Game-like idol supporting experience Gameplay： 1. Choose the dancer. 3.Choose the dance you want to watch. 4.Enjoy the dancing performance of real beautiful girls. 4. During the dance, follow the music and shake the handles to cheer for the dancer, triggering more stage special effects. The cheering points will make her popular and be seen by more users. She will become a superstar. We look forward to collecting your opinions and suggestions to make the game better. Contact us: busiyg@163.com Some players cannot download model success in the game, you can refer to here：https://holodata.s3.cn-northwest-1.amazonaws.com.cn/WowDance/dowloadList.txt
data.about_the_game:
Wow Dance is officially on the shelf, come and enjoy the stage with the glamorous and energetic girls!
Wow Dance is a real person 3D video experience game, which is based on the latest holographic 3D video and VR technology. It integrates Volumetric Video into various virtual scenes.
Here, you can choose your favorite real-life idol to present beautiful dances for you, enjoying immersive audio-visual feast. While watching, you can shake the support sticks to cheer for the idol, creating a brilliant stage effect together!

Features introduction:
1.The first 4D vivid VR dance show
2.Game-like idol supporting experience

Gameplay：
1. Choose the dancer.
3.Choose the dance you want to watch.
4.Enjoy the dancing performance of real beautiful girls.
4. During the dance, follow the music and shake the handles to cheer for the dancer, triggering more stage special effects. The cheering points will make her popular and be seen by more users. She will become a superstar.

We look forward to collecting your opinions and suggestions to make the game better.
Contact us: busiyg@163.com

Some players cannot download model success in the game, you can refer to here：https://holodata.s3.cn-northwest-1.amazonaws.com.cn/WowDance/dowloadList.txt
data.short_description: Wow Dance is a real person 3D video experience game Here, you can choose your favorite real-life idol to present beautiful dances for you, enjoying immersive audio-visual feast. While watching, you can shake the support sticks to cheer for the idol, creating a brilliant stage effect together!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350)
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
